prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with vibrant green feathers and striking red accents.
I want a psychic-type Pokemon that can predict the future with its colorful wings.
Generate a unique Pokemon with a sleek design and a mystical aura surrounding it.
Make a Pokemon that embodies wisdom and tranquility, with colorful plumage and a gentle demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, blending nature with city life.
Design a Pokemon with a strong psychic presence that captivates everyone around it.
Give me a bipedal Pokemon that can use telepathy and has a whimsical appearance.
